lead_paragraph: Manchester City manager Manuel Pellegrini conceded that Leicester City were worthy favourites to lift the Premier League title following his side's humbling in their top-of-the-table clash on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Pellegrini Says Leicester Are Worthy Title Favourites
headline.main: Pellegrini Says Leicester Are Worthy Title Favourites

snippet: Manchester City manager Manuel Pellegrini conceded that Leicester City were worthy favourites to lift the Premier League title following his side's humbling in their top-of-the-table clash on Saturday....
